Title: Scene Members: cancel/discard changes
Description: Discard unsaved changes.
Steps:
1. Make changes
2. Tap 'Cancel' or navigate back
Expected Result: Changes discarded; confirm dialog if needed.

Title: Scene Members: toggle on/off
Description: Validate toggle behavior.
Steps:
1. Observe default state
2. Toggle ON
3. Toggle OFF
Expected Result: State toggles correctly; persists if applicable.

Title: Scene Members: toggle access control
Description: Restricted toggle visibility/behavior.
Steps: 1. Attempt toggle with insufficient permission
Expected Result: Toggle disabled or action denied.

Title: Scene Members: search filters list
Description: Filter by query.
Steps:
1. Focus search
2. Type query
Expected Result: Only matching rows shown.

Title: Scene Members: search no results
Description: Empty state for non-matching query.
Steps: 1. Enter random query
Expected Result: No results message shown.

Title: Scene Members: list visible/scrollable
Description: Rows visible and scrollable.
Steps:
1. Open screen
2. Scroll list
Expected Result: Rows remain visible and interactive.

Title: Scene Members: long names render correctly
Description: No overflow or truncation bugs.
Steps: 1. Locate items with long labels
Expected Result: No clipping; ellipsis or wrap per design; full value available.

Title: Scene Members: list count matches header
Description: Header count equals list rows.
Steps: 1. Count visible rows
Expected Result: Count equals 12.

Title: Scene Members: accessibility labeling
Description: Accessible names/roles/focus order.
Steps: 1. Inspect with screen reader
Expected Result: Correct roles/names; logical focus order; dynamic updates announced.

Title: Scene Member Addition
Description: Verify that a user can successfully add a member to a scene.
Preconditions:
User is logged in
User is on the Scene Members page
Steps:
1. Click on 'Add Member' button
2. Select a member from the available members list
3. Confirm the addition
Expected Result: The selected member is added to the scene and appears in the members list.

Title: Scene Member Removal
Description: Verify that a user can successfully remove a member from a scene.
Preconditions:
User is logged in
User has at least one member in the scene
Steps:
1. Select a member from the members list
2. Click on 'Remove Member' button
3. Confirm the removal
Expected Result: The selected member is removed from the scene and no longer appears in the members list.

Title: Search Functionality
Description: Verify that the search functionality works correctly for finding members by name or MAC address.
Preconditions:
User is logged in
User is on the Scene Members page
Steps:
1. Enter a valid member name or MAC address in the search bar
2. Click on the 'Search' button
Expected Result: The search results display the member that matches the search criteria.

Title: Longer Name Handling
Description: Verify that the system can handle longer names for scene members without errors.
Preconditions:
User is logged in
User is on the Scene Members page
Steps:
1. Attempt to add a member with a name exceeding the typical character limit
2. Confirm the addition
Expected Result: The system accepts the longer name and adds the member without any errors.

Title: Back Navigation
Description: Verify that pressing the 'Back' button navigates the user to the previous page correctly.
Preconditions:
User is logged in
User is on the Scene Members page
Steps: 1. Click on the 'Back' button
Expected Result: User is navigated back to the previous page without losing any data.

Title: Unauthorized Access to Scene Members
Description: Verify that users without the necessary permissions cannot access the Scene Members page.
Preconditions: User is logged in with limited permissions
Steps: 1. Attempt to navigate to the Scene Members page
Expected Result: User receives an error message indicating insufficient permissions.
